articles.title: National Meeting Observes Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
National Meeting Observes Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Wednesday to celebrate the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was present at the meeting.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the party, state and army, the chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions and industrial establishments in the city, those who had the honor of being received by Kim Jong Il, persons of merit, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs and working people, congratulatory groups and delegations of overseas compatriots and other overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and military attaches here and foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said February 16 is shining as the day of great fortune when the Korean people and other progressive peoples in the world greeted a peerlessly great man who would lead the cause of independence along the path of victory for all ages.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The history of Kim Jong Il's revolutionary leadership is an epic of the most devoted and heroic struggle of an outstanding revolutionary who glorified the history of modern Korea as annals of victory of socialism with his unique ideology and leadership. It is also the history of a prominent leader who left marks in the history of the world socialist movement and powerfully accelerated the cause of human independence.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea by adding new principles and contents to it as required by the times and the developing revolution and comprehensively formulated and systemized the socialist theory on the basis of it.
					
					 He strictly adhered to the firm anti-imperialist independent stand and socialist principle in the whole course of revolutionary leadership, foiled the enemy's offensive against revolution through a revolutionary offensive, advanced the revolution and construction in the Korean style and thus consolidated and developed socialism of Juche and strikingly demonstrated its invincibility.
					
					 He, regarding it as his lifetime political faith to believe in the people as in Heaven, put forward the people as the most precious beings in the world, settled all matters on the principle of absolutely prioritizing their interests, let the party, state and army serve them only and made sure that all the wealth of society contributed to promoting their wellbeing.
					
					 He developed the WPK into a strong guiding force for carrying out the cause of socialism and consolidated the unity and cohesion of the party and the revolutionary ranks as firm as a rock, opening up a new path of building a socialist ruling party for over half a century.
					
					 He developed the Korean People's Army into a powerful revolutionary Paektusan army capable of annihilating any imperialist aggressor forces at a single strike, putting the defence industry on a fresh Juche and modern basis and put all the people under arms and turned the whole country into an impregnable fortress.
					
					 When the world socialist movement was sustaining serious setbacks, he held higher the banner of Juche-based socialism, set an epochal example in the drive for realizing the independence of the popular masses, instilled confidence in victory into the progressive people and powerfully accelerated the advance of the socialist movement.
					
					 The revolutionary career and immortal feats of Kim Jong Il who provided a firm foundation for the victory of the cause of the people for independence and the socialist cause and opened a bright prospect in the glorious era of Kim Jong Un will shine for all ages.
					
					 The reporter called for accomplishing the socialist cause of Juche with Kim Jong Il's idea and feats as the eternal cornerstone.
					
					 He also called for dynamically advancing toward the final victory of the socialist cause of Juche, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Similar meetings were held in each province, city and county and at industrial complexes on the same day.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman of DPRK Slams U.S. and Vassal Forces for Faulting Its Strategic Ballistic Missile Test-fire
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman of DPRK Slams U.S. and Vassal Forces for Faulting Its Strategic Ballistic Missile Test-fire 
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Wednesday as regards the fact that the U.S. and its vassal forces faulted the DPRK's surface-to-surface medium to long-range strategic ballistic missile test-fire:
					 The UN Security Council issued a press release under the manipulation of the U.S. on Feb. 13 in which it faulted the DPRK's test-fire as a "breach of resolution" and threatened it would take "additional crucial measures".
					
					 The recent missile test-fire conducted by the DPRK is part of normal course which it has to go through in implementing the line of simultaneous development of the two fronts, its state line.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address for this year declared that the preparations for the inter-continental ballistic rocket test-fire had reached the final phase, and in the subsequent period, the DPRK officially clarified more than once that the measure for further bolstering its nuclear force can be taken any moment the Supreme Leader makes his decision.
					
					 The self-defensive measure is for firmly protecting the sovereignty of the country and the right to existence of the nation from the threat of nuclear war posed by the U.S. and its vassal forces and reliably guaranteeing the peace on the Korean peninsula and the security of the region.
					
					 No one is entitled to fault this legitimate right of a sovereign state.
					
					 The UNSC has long been disqualified to take issue with the DPRK's legitimate step for self-defence as it has gone to the extremes in its application of double-standards by which it labels the tests carried out by the DPRK for self-defence "illegal" but keeps mum about the tests conducted by the U.S. and other countries. 
					
					 For UN member nations or the UN secretary general to blindly follow the UNSC resolution, failing to discern its absurd double-dealing attitude, means that they do not properly perform their duties.
					
					 There is no paragraph in the UN Charter which specifies nuclear test and missile test-fire as illegal. Therefore, the DPRK will never acknowledge the UNSC "resolution" which termed the DPRK's nuclear test and rocket test-fire "illegal", and will never do in the future, either.
					
					 We categorically reject the press release of the UNSC which took issue with the right of a sovereign state to self-defence under the high-handed pressure of the U.S. in utter disregard of the DPRK's just demand.

articles.title: International Kim Jong Il Prize Awarded to IIJI Secretary General
articles.content:
International Kim Jong Il Prize Awarded to IIJI Secretary General
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- International Kim Jong Il Prize was awarded to Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI).
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education who is chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea, and Ju Chang Il, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Also on hand were Mukesh Sharma, secretary general of the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council, Henry Masiko, director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and, Alexandr Prokhanov, editor-in-chief of the Russian newspaper Zavtra, who are members of the Council, and Kenichi Ogami and his party.
					
					 A decision of the Council was read out, and Kim Yong Nam awarded a diploma, gold medal and cup to Kenichi Ogami at the proposal of the Council.
					
					 Kim noted that Kenichi Ogami has actively conducted the study and dissemination of the Juche idea for decades while fully supporting the Korean people's struggle for national reunification and international justice.
					
					 Then congratulatory speeches were made.
					
					 Kenichi Ogami expressed his resolve to intensify the study and dissemination of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival Opens
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The 25th Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, was opened here Wednesday.
					  Present at its opening ceremony were O Su Yong, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ki Kwang Ho, minister of Finance and chairman of the Figure Skating Association, and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international bodies here and their spouses, members of the military attaches corps here and their wives and staff members of foreign embassies here, foreign guests and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Taking part in the festival are figure skaters from the DPRK, Russia, Belarus, Canada, France and Italy.
					
					 Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, in his opening address expressed belief that the festival would bring great joy to the Korean people out in the efforts to building a socialist power.
					
					 There was a demonstration performance "February Holiday Is Forever".
					
					 DPRK's figure skaters presented "The Sound of a Horse's Hooves in Mt Paektu", "For the Revolution", "We Will Go to Mt Paektu" and other numbers.
					
					 Foreign skaters displayed their figure skating technique in such numbers as "Cracker".

articles.title: Synchronized Swimming Demonstration Presented
articles.content:
Synchronized Swimming Demonstration Presented
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A synchronized swimming demonstration "February of Yearning" was presented at the Swimming Pool of the Changgwang Health Complex on Wednesday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Among the spectators were O Su Yong, vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Jon Kwang Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials of ministries and national institutions, working people in the city, overseas Koreans' congratulatory group and delegations and other compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations and military attaches here and their wives, the members of their embassies and foreign guests.
					
					 Presented to the demonstration were such numbers as duet synchronized swimming "The General Is the Son of the Guerrillas", group synchronized swimming "We Are the Happiest in the World" and youth and schoolchildren's group synchronized swimming "The General and Children".
					
					 The performers represented with elegant rhythms and diverse change of formation the Korean army and people's deep reverence for Kim Jong Il who performed the great exploits to remain forever in the history of the country.
					
					 They also well showed the reality of the DPRK confidently advancing after successful launch of the ballistic missile "Pukguksong" with the might of the spirit of single minded unity and the spirit of Kangwon Province in the general offensive this year under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Party and State Commendations to Labor Innovators
articles.content:
Party and State Commendations to Labor Innovators
 Yomju, February 15 (KCNA) -- Party and state commendations were awarded to the officials and builders who performed labor feats in completing the first-phase project of the Honggondo Tideland with due ceremony on Wednesday.
					 Officials and workers of the North Phyongan Provincial Tideland Reclamation Enterprise completed the first-phase project of the Honggondo Tideland in the spirit displayed at the constructions of the Taegyedo Reclaimed Tideland and the second-phase project of the Kwaksan Reclaimed Tideland.
					
					 Choe Yong Dok was awarded Order of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The title of Labor Hero of the DPRK and Gold Medal (Hammer and Sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class were conferred upon So Won Gil and Kil Pyong Do.
					
					 So Hyon Chol, So Kwang Chol and O Pyong Gon were honored to receive watches bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Citations of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, were conferred upon Jo Sung Yon and Kim Kyu Hyon and other 11 persons.
					
					 Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize went to Han Chol Jin and Choe Mun Hyok and Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize to Choe Jin Chol.
					
					 The title of Merited Builder was awarded to Kim Ung Nam and the title of Merited Driver to Kim Won Jun and Mun Ryong Un.
					
					 Orders including Order of National Flag First Class and medals were awarded to many officials and builders.

articles.title: Stamps Issued to Mark Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Stamps Issued to Mark Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued new stamps (one sheet and one individual) to mark the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the Day of the Shining Star.
					 Seen on the upper part of the stamps are letters reading "In celebration of the 75th birth anniversary of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il".
					
					 A circle-shape stamp represents Kimjongilia that has come into full bloom, reflecting deep reverence and desire of the Korean people and the world's progressives to splendidly celebrate the Day of the Shining Star as the greatest national holiday and a holiday common to the humankind.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign embassy officials in charge cultural and friendly relations visited the venue of the 21st Kimjongilia Festival Wednesday, a day before the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 After going round the festival venue, they made entries in the visitor's book.
					
					 Earlier, they visited the Youth Movement Museum.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Nigerian Party Leader
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Nigerian Party Leader
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Goodswill Nnaji, national chairman of the Better Nigeria Progressive Party, presented a gift to leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his 75th birth anniversary.
					He handed the gift over to the DPRK ambassador to Nigeria on Feb. 10.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Gifts to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Gifts to Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) and his party and gifts from the Mukesh Sharma, secretary general of the International Kim Jong Il Prize Council, and Alexandr Prokhanov, editor-in-chief of the Zavtra and director of the above-said council, who are staying here to mark the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The floral basket and gifts were handed over to an official concerned Wednesday.
					
					 On the same day, a gift presented by the IIJI to Kim Jong Un was conveyed.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il from Abroad
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il from Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The International Kim Jong Il Prize Council, the Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and personages of different countries, including President Jindallae Saphariny of the Jindalle Children's Foundation, sent floral baskets to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill here on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					 The floral baskets were laid at the statues on Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreigners
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreigners
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received floral baskets from foreign organizations, personages and family Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They are the Japanese reparatory committee and the Gunma, Japan, prefectural preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange, the Fukushima Prefectural People's Council for Japan-Korea Friendship, the Shigoku Liaison Society for Japan-Korea Friendship, the Hiroshima Prefectural People's Council for Japan-Korea Friendship, the American regional preparatory committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Yuwen Middle School in Jilin of China, the family of Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr Zhang Weihua and Osvaldo Larriva Alvarado, chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He also received a floral basket in the joint name of the African regional preparatory committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People headquartered in Nigeria.

articles.title: Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Cuban Leader
articles.content:
Reply Message to Kim Jong Un from Cuban Leader
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a reply message from Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on February 2.
					 In the message Raul Castro Ruz expressed, on behalf of the Communist Party of Cuba and the government and people of Cuba, thanks to Kim Jong Un for having sent warm congratulations on the 58th anniversary of the victorious Cuban revolution.
					
					 And he reaffirmed the will to steadily strengthen the friendly and cooperative relations and solidarity between the parties, peoples and governments of the two countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats in Building Economic Power
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats in Building Economic Power
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the Day of the Shining Star (February 16), leader Kim Jong Il's birthday, the army and people of the DPRK are recollecting with deep emotion the great feats he performed in building an economic power.
					 It was a lifetime desire of President Kim Il Sung and steadfast will of leader Kim Jong Il to build a socialist power of Juche.
					
					 When the country was in difficulties in the 1990s, Kim Jong Il created the spirit of Kanggye and kindled the torch of Songgang to provide a springboard to the building of a socialist power.
					
					 To effect another great revolutionary upsurge in Kangson where the great Chollima upsurge was witnessed after the Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953), he visited the Chollima Steel Complex in December Juche 97 (2008) to call upon its workers to take the lead in making another leap in production.
					
					 The workers of the complex, encouraged by his patriotic call, sent a letter appealing for a great progress in production to all the working people of the country and worked miracles in the van of general offensive. 
					
					 In response to their appeal, other working people of the country took a bold jump in the economic construction.
					
					 Production went up in major industrial sectors and a great number of industrial establishments overfulfilled their national economic plans and major construction projects progressed apace.
					
					 He also made a new history of CNC-based industrialization by overcoming all difficulties in the period of the Arduous March. Later, he recalled those days with deep emotion, saying that the CNC-based industrialization was one of greatest achievement we have made.
					
					 Thanks to his far-sighted wisdom and wise leadership, the DPRK could become a space power which develops latest science and technology by its own efforts.
					
					 He organized a research group with able scientists and technicians and gave detailed guidance to all problems arising in developing artificial satellite.
					
					 Under his wise leadership, the DPRK's first satellite Kwangmyongsong-1 was launched on the threshold of the 50th founding anniversary of the DPRK in 1998 and Kwanmyongsong-2 in April 2009.
					
					 Indeed, Kim Jong Il is a peerless patriot and great man who laid a firm foundation for building an economic power by braving the worst ordeals and difficulties.

articles.title: Quality Control Further Improved in DPRK
articles.content:
Quality Control Further Improved in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is channeling bigger efforts into the quality control this year, a year of key importance in carrying out the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					 Primary efforts have been directed to improving the quality control in electric power, metal and chemical industries.
					
					 Various industrial establishments, including the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex, Chollima Steel Complex and the February 8 Vinalon Complex, strive to update the weighing and measuring instruments and analysis equipment for different production processes and carry out the control and test for newly-established production processes in a scientific way.
					
					 The same is true of the fields of railways, coal and machine-building.
					
					 The light industrial sector concentrates efforts on developing quality control rules into a regular system, while pushing forward a work to improve the method of quality inspection, keep hygienic standard in the production and pack products more presentable.
					
					 It has been encouraged to ensure the quality of goods in close cooperation between inspectors and producers or consumers. And factories and enterprises are urged to steadily raise the quality of their products on the basis of science and technology.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Scrapping of Business Mobile Phones of High-ranking Officials in S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Scrapping of Business Mobile Phones of High-ranking Officials in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that business mobile phones of high-ranking officials in south Korea are being physically scrapped, sparking off great furor.
					 Documents were massively destroyed at Chongwadae, the Intelligence Service and other power bodies of south Korea in the past, but it is the first time that even the business mobile phones of ministers and chiefs of agencies are scrapped.
					
					 Such farce of the south Korean puppet group is a cunning artifice conceived by Park Geun Hye and her yes men to destroy evidence proving their crimes being disclosed almost everyday.
					
					 As well known, not a few serious crimes of Park and her lackeys were proved by records in mobile phones after the outbreak of "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal".
					
					 The contents of records in the mobile phone of Jong Ho Song, former chief secretary affiliated to Chongwadae, disclosed the true colors of Park, a puppet of female shaman Choe Sun Sil. The vice-chairman of the "National Federation of Businessmen" and An Jong Bom, former chief secretary for policy coordination of Chongwadae, responded to the investigation by the prosecution only after scrapping their mobile phones containing conversations and messages in a bid to destroy evidence proving their crimes.
					
					 With the doomsday of the Park regime drawing nearer, it is going busy with the above-said ruckus.
					
					 This is a mean attempt being made by those with guilty conscience.
					
					 It is hard fact that most of the incumbent ministers and chiefs of agencies who scrapped their mobile phones before any others are those who have shielded Park and Choe or have been suspected of being involved in the hideous scandal. This goes to prove that Park and her yes men are running the whole gamut of sinister intrigues to seek a way out.
					
					 South Korean opposition parties and personages of different social standings bitterly denounce the scrapping of mobile phones, branding it as "a stopgap measure to dodge the special investigation".
					
					 Nevertheless, a relevant person of the puppet Intelligence Service made excuses in a bid to fool the public, claiming that some of the numbers of former and incumbent high-ranking officials' phones leaked at the time of hacking attack of the north against the south Korean defense ministry in December last year and it proposed the replacement of business mobile phones to prevent the repetition of damage." However, south Koreans are spitting at the poor and disgusting behavior of the Park group vociferating about the "threat from the north" at the death-bed.
					
					 It was none other than the Intelligence Service which organized the mobile phone scrapping campaign and forced high-ranking officials to do so from the end of last year.
					
					 The IS has played the role of a shock brigade to check the impeachment of Park Geun Hye under the pretence of "coping with the north's hacking", and this brought to light that Chongwadae is the center of all criminal operations and conspiratorial plots.
					
					 It is the conservative group that should be thrown overboard to the last man as it is forsaken by the people.
					
					 The Park group's base campaign is only precipitating its doomsday.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Mud-slinging Cannot Be Justified in Any Case: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Mud-slinging Cannot Be Justified in Any Case: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- All sorts of smear campaigns rattling the nerves of the other side and inciting confrontation cannot be justified under any circumstances.
					 Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday says this in an article.
					
					 Mud-slinging should be stopped, to begin with, in order to improve the north-south relations, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The relations between Pyongyang and Seoul are at the lowest ebb in history.
					
					 The relations are so tense that the situation has reached the brink of a war after going beyond the state of suffocation. It was created by all sorts of mud-slinging.
					
					 Mud-slinging is the root cause of the catastrophe of the north-south relations as it is a revelation of repugnancy and hostility toward the fellow countrymen.
					
					 Hurling mud at the other side with lies only to serve a sinister political purpose is a stumbling block lying in the way of achieving national reconciliation and unity and mending the north-south relations.
					
					 There live in the north and the south compatriots with the same language. 
					
					 Though the differing ideologies and social systems exist in the north and the south due to the national division caused by foreign forces, they cannot be a ground for the compatriots to mistrust and antagonize each other.
					
					 The north-south relations can never be repaired if the smear campaign is allowed to go on, not recognizing each other's ideology and social system but antagonizing each other.
					
					 The ceaseless mud-slinging would only lead to a military conflict and war.
					
					 Neither north-south relations can improve nor peace and reunification of the country be achieved unless the smear campaign creating antagonism and discord among compatriots is halted. This is a serious lesson taught by the stern history of the national reunification movement.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Action to Bring Nuclear Disaster to Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Action to Bring Nuclear Disaster to Nation
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet authorities announced that they agreed with the U.S. warmongers to stage Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises this year on a larger scale than the biggest-ever war rehearsals conducted last year.
					 Meanwhile, they wooed media into loudly advertising that U.S. nuclear-powered carrier Carl Vinson, nuclear strategic bombers B-2 and B-52 and other nuclear strategic assets would be massively deployed in the projected muscle-flexing.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary terms this an unpardonable, criminal action of pro-U.S. lackeys keen to escalate the confrontation with the compatriots and bring a nuclear disaster to the Korean nation.
					
					 It is an important task facing the nation to achieve detente on the peninsula and improve inter-Korean relations, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 Therefore, the present situation requires the south Korean authorities to think with cool heads and behave with reason.
					
					 This not withstanding, the puppet regime has disclosed its intention to intensify the joint military drills against the north together with the U.S., far from responding to the north's efforts to improve the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 This brought to light once again their heinous scenario to provoke a nuclear war against the north together with outside forces and push the situation to an extreme phase of tension while persistently turning down the north's goodwill and magnanimous offer.
					
					 Tragedy is that the puppet group of traitors is making desperate efforts to do harm to the compatriots in the north, not aware of their wretched plight without an elementary sense of the reality. 
					
					 It is pitiful for them to act without discretion like a stupid still counting on their master U.S. who looks no more reliable.
					
					 Even U.S. nuclear strategic assets can never help the puppet forces get out of the pitfall of destruction.

articles.title: Chairwomen of Headquarters of Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan Meet
articles.content:
Chairwomen of Headquarters of Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan Meet
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting of chairwomen of headquarters of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan was held at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Feb. 8-9.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Kang Chu Ryon, vice-chairwoman of the above-said committee and chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan and Han Tong Song, director of the Organizational Bureau of Chongryon, and chairwomen of the women' union headquarters in different parts.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said in his speech that the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan is a mass organization that has remained loyal to the leader through generations and registered the history of loving the country and nation for many years.
					
					 He stressed the need for the chairwomen of the headquarters to thoroughly apply the idea and intention contained in respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address to the work of the union.
					
					 Kang Chu Ryon said in her report that this year is of weighty significance as it marks the 70th anniversary of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan and, accordingly, a vigorous innovation movement should be launched to glorify the whole year with signal achievements in the union's work.
					
					 She stressed the importance to consolidate the union into a strong organization and intensify the education of children and the work to preserve and develop the national education, make progress in the work for information, education and national culture and turn out in a drive for carrying out the three-point patriotic task.
					
					 Then followed speeches.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by British Organization
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Strengthening the People's Army and Creating a Social Climate in Which Prominence Is Given to Military Affairs" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on Feb. 3.
					 The work, published on Feb. 4, Juche 81 (1992), deals with the issue of holding a large-scale military parade to celebrate the 60th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army in the presence of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for strengthening the People's Army and creating a social climate in which priority is given to military affairs.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Myanmar
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Myanmar personages issued statements on Feb. 2 and 3 to mark the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Tha Win, secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, stated:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism as required by the trend of the world political situation and the era of independence against imperialism and wisely led the Workers' Party of Korea to open up the road of prosperity by dint of Songun.
					
					 The development of the WPK into the guiding force would have been unthinkable without his leadership.
					
					 His august name will shine forever along with the history of the WPK which has demonstrated only victory.
					
					 Paying high tribute to Kim Jong Il who had made undying contributions to the human cause of independence, Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute and chairman of the Myanmar Preparatory Committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea and thus gave the powerful ideo-theoretical weapon to the world progressives struggling for independence.
					
					 He resolutely smashed the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. and other imperialists with the treasured sword of Songun.

articles.title: Immortal Hymn "Song of General Kim Jong Il" Popular in Many Countries
articles.content:
Immortal Hymn "Song of General Kim Jong Il" Popular in Many Countries
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- It has been 20 years since the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Jong Il" was created as a monumental masterpiece of the era.
					 The creation of the ode to the sun on the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il in Juche 86 (1997) was a clear expression of all people's admiration for Kim Jong Il who performed immortal great exploits for the country and the nation, the times and history. It was a great auspicious event of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 The song praising the peerless Songun brilliant commander, unmatched patriot and great sage of the revolution has been widely disseminated in more than 150 countries.
					
					 Many art troupes and artistes of different countries visited the DPRK on the significant occasions, including the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, and made impressive presentation of this song in solo, chorus and other artistic forms.

articles.title: Overseas Compatriots' Organization Praises DPRK
articles.content:
Overseas Compatriots' Organization Praises DPRK
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. posted an article praising the reality of the DPRK in 2016 on its website on January 30.
					Noting that 2016 in the north was a year started and concluded with torch, the article said:
					
					In particular, an evening gala of torchlight held by youth and students with splendor struck terror into the hearts of the enemies who were busy to dare hurt the supreme leadership and demonstrated to the world the proud appearance of the people united close behind their leader and their strong will to devote their lives to him.
					
					Everywhere soldiers and construction shock brigades went in the north there was torchlight lighting night as bright as daytime.
					
					They created legendary speed of Mallima with torchlight and constructed lots of modern structures at this speed.
					
					The legendary achievements startled the world and neutralized the unprecedented nuclear threat, sanctions and blockade by the enemies, the article stressed.

articles.title: Acto central por el 75o aniversario del natalicio de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Acto central por el 75o aniversario del natalicio de Kim Jong Il 
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el acto central por el 75o aniversario del natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					Asistio al acto el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido y las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, cuadros de las instituciones, fabricas y empresas en la capital, personas que fueron recibidas por el Dirigente, ameritados, familiares de martires revolucionarios, trabajadores, el grupo de felicitacion de compatriotas, compatriotas y sus delegaciones y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los agregados militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					El informante dijo que el pueblo coreano y los demas progresistas del mundo celebran el 16 de febrero como dia de gran fortuna en que acogieron a un gran conductor de la causa de la independencia de la humanidad a la unica senda de la victoria. 
					
					La historia de la direccion revolucionaria del Dirigente brilla como la epopeya de la lucha mas abnegada y heroica del prominente revolucionario y lider que con original idea y direccion corono la historia de Corea moderna como anales de la victoria del socialismo, dejo indelebles huellas en la historia del movimiento socialista mundial e impulso activamente la causa de la independencia de la humanidad, destaco y continuo:
					
					El Dirigente profundizo y desarrollo la idea Juche con nuevos principios y contenidos de acuerdo con la demanda de la epoca y la revolucion en desarrollo, y a base de ello, sistematizo globalmente la teoria socialista. 
					
					En todo el proceso de su direccion sobre la revolucion, mantuvo con firmeza la posicion independiente y antiimperialista y los principios socialistas, frustro con la ofensiva revolucionaria la ofensiva contrarrevolucionaria de los enemigos y llevo adelante al estilo coreano la revolucion y la construccion. De esta manera, consolido y desarrollo el socialismo coreano de tipo jucheano y manifesto plenamente su invencibilidad. 
					
					Al considerar el noble ideario Iminwichon (considerar al pueblo como el cielo) como su credo politico de toda la vida, presento al pueblo como ente mas precioso en el mundo, soluciono todos los problemas tomando como pauta absoluta los intereses del pueblo y dirigio para que el Partido, el Estado y el ejercito sirvieran solo para el pueblo y que todos los bienes de la sociedad tambien se contribuyeran al fomento del bienestar del pueblo. 
					
					Durante largo tiempo de mas de medio siglo, allano la nueva coyuntura de la construccion del partido socialista en el poder para que el Partido del Trabajo de Corea se fortaleciera como poderosa fuerza orientadora del cumplimiento de la causa socialista y se consolidara como muralla de acero la unidad monolitica del Partido y las filas revolucionarias. 
					
					Desarrollo el Ejercito Popular como invicto ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu capaz de aniquilar de un golpe a cualesquier invasores imperialistas, elevo a la nueva etapa el nivel autoctono y moderno de la industria de defensa nacional y convirtio la patria en el baluarte inexpugnable basado en el armamento de todo el pueblo. 
					
					Cuando el movimiento socialista mundial sufria el fracaso, levanto en lo mas alto la bandera socialista del Juche y creo el modelo de la epoca para la independencia de las masas populares infundiendo la fe en la victoria en los pueblos progresistas y promoviendo el avance del movimiento socialista. 
					
					Seran eternas la vida revolucionaria y las imperecederas hazanas del Dirigente quien asento el firme fundamento para la victoria de la causa de la independencia de las masas populares, la del socialismo, y abrio la radiante perspectiva de la gloriosa era de Kim Jong Un.
					
					Hay que llevar a feliz termino la causa socialista del Juche tomando como eterna base la idea y las hazanas del Dirigente.
					
					Por ultimo, el informante exhorto a todos a unirse compactamente en torno al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y marchar con vigor hacia la victoria final de la causa socialista de tipo jucheano. 
					
					El mismo dia, tuvieron lugar los actos similares en todas las provincias, ciudades, distritos y complejos industriales.

articles.title: MINREX rechaza comunicado del Consejo de Seguridad sobre disparo del nuevo cohete
articles.content:
MINREX rechaza comunicado del Consejo de Seguridad sobre disparo del nuevo cohete
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que los Estados Unidos y sus satelites cuestionan el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico estrategico tierra-tierra de mediano y largo alcance, recien efectuado por la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 15 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					El pasado dia 13, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU bajo el mando de EE.UU. publico un comunicado, segun el cual tomara "importante medida adicional" anti-RPDC calificando de supuesta "violacion de la resolucion" el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico estrategico tierra-tierra de mediano y largo alcance que es un proceso normal para la materializacion de la linea estatal de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un declaro en su mensaje del Ano Nuevo 2017 que llegaron a la etapa final los preparativos de lanzamiento de prueba del ICBM. 
					
					Posteriormente, hemos aclarado oficialmente en varias ocasiones que tomaremos las medidas para elevar el nivel de las fuerzas armadas nucleares en cualquier momento que decida el Maximo Dirigente. 
					
					Estas medidas de caracter autodefensivo defenderan la soberania del pais y el derecho a la subsistencia de la nacion desde la amenaza de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y sus satelites y preservaran fidedignamente la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la seguridad regional. 
					
					Nadie puede censurar este derecho legitimo de un Estado soberano. 
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU califica de "ilegales" los lanzamientos de prueba que realiza la RPDC para la autodefensa, pero se mantiene callado sobre las pruebas de EE.UU. y otros paises. 
					
					Pues, este aparato internacional, climax de la pauta de doble rasero, perdio ya hace mucho tiempo la calificacion para censurar las justas medidas de autodefensa de la RPDC. 
					
					Observar a ciegas la resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad sin distinguir su injusto acto de doble rasero no significa el cumplimiento del deber del pais miembro de la ONU o del secretario general de la ONU. 
					
					No hay en ninguna parte de la Carta de la ONU el parrafo que haya estipulado como ilegalidad la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de prueba de misil. Por lo tanto, no reconocemos ni lo haremos jamas con la "resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad que describe como actos "ilegales" la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de ensayo de cohete de la RPDC. 
					
					Rechazamos totalmente el comunicado del Consejo de Seguridad que rendido ante el despotismo de EE.UU., cuestiona el derecho a la autodefensa de un Estado soberano desoyendo la justa demanda de nuestro pais.

articles.title: Tiene lugar ceremonia de otorgamiento del Premio Internacional Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tiene lugar ceremonia de otorgamiento del Premio Internacional Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ACNC) -- Fue otorgado el Premio Internacional Kim Jong Il al secretario general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, Kenichi Ogami.
					La ceremonia de otorgamiento tuvo lugar este miercoles en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae.
					
					Participaron en la ocasion el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, el presidente de la Asociacion de Cientificos Sociales de Corea, Thae Hyong Chol, quien es rector general de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y ministro de Educacion Superior, y el subjefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ju Chang Il, y otros. 
					
					Tambien, estuvieron presentes el secretario general del Consejo del Premio Internacional Kim Jong Il, Mukesh Sharma, y su comitiva, el consejero de la citada entidad y director general del Comite Regional Africano para el Estudio de la Idea Juche, Henry Masiko, el consejero de la misma entidad y editor-jefe del periodico ruso Zavtra, Alexandr Projanov, y sus acompanantes, el secretario general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche, Kenichi Ogami, y su comitiva.
					
					Se dio lectura a la resolucion correspondiente del Consejo del Premio Internacional Kim Jong Il.
					
					Y segun la propuesta del Consejo, Kim Yong Nam otorgo a Kenichi Ogami el certificado, la medalla de oro y la copa.
					
					Kim Yong Nam dijo que durante varios decenios Kenichi Ogami desarrollo las actividades de estudio y divulgacion de la idea Juche y apoyo activamente la lucha del pueblo coreano por la reunificacion de la patria y la justicia internacional.
					
					Acto seguido, hubo discursos de felicitacion.
					
					Kenichi Ogami hablo de su alegria y emocion por haber recibido el premio con el nombre del Dirigente y expreso la decision de dinamizar mas las actividades de estudio y divulgacion de la idea Juche.

articles.title: Inaugurado Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico sobre Hielo
articles.content:
Inaugurado Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico sobre Hielo
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ACNC) -- Quedo iniciado el dia 15 en esta capital el XXV Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico sobre el Hielo por el Premio Paektusan dedicado al Dia de la Estrella Luz.
					La cita deportiva se desarrolla cada ano testimoniando la infinita veneracion de todo el pueblo al Dirigente Kim Jong Il e intercambiando las tecnicas y experiencias adquiridas por los patinaderos bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad.
					
					A la ceremonia inaugural asistieron el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, O Su Yong, el presidente de la Asociacion de Patinaje Artistico de Corea, Ki Kwang Ho, ministro de Finanzas, los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises y de organizaciones internacionales, los de agregados militares, y los miembros de embajadas, acreditados en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, los huespedes extranjeros y los coreanos en ultramar.
					
					Participaron en la ocasion los patinadores de la RPDC, Rusia, Belarus, Canada, Francia e Italia.
					
					El ministro de Deportes Kim Il Guk declaro la apertura del festival expresando su conviccion de que el presente festival dara alegria al pueblo coreano levantado en la lucha por construir la potencia socialista.
					
					Hubo la demostracion modelo "La fiesta de febrero es eterna".
					
					Los jugadores coreanos pusieron sobre el hielo las piezas "Trote de caballo del Paektu", "Para la revolucion", "Iremos al monte Paektu" y otras.
					
					Los jugadores extranjeros demostraron la elegancia y la habilidad deportiva en las piezas entre otras "Reyes sobre hielo".

articles.title: Efectuada presentacion modelo de natacion sincronica por el 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Efectuada presentacion modelo de natacion sincronica por el 16 de febrero
Pyongyang, 15 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, tuvo lugar el dia 15 en la piscina del Complejo de Servicios de Higiene Changgwang la presentacion modelo de natacion sincronica "Febrero de anoranza".
					La presenciaron O Su Yong, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el vicepremier Jon Kwang Ho, los funcionarios de los ministerios y organos centrales, los capitalinos, los grupos de felicitacion y las delegaciones de los coreanos en ultramar, los compatriotas y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Fueron invitados los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos y de las organizaciones internacionales y de los agregados militares, los integrantes de las embajadas de varios paises en la RPDC y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					En la presentacion se ofrecieron el duo "El General es el hijo de la guerrilla", la natacion sincronica colectiva "No envidiamos nada a nadie en el mundo", la colectiva de los jovenes y ninos "El General y los ninos" y otras piezas.
					
					Con sus movimientos elegantes y formaciones variadas, las ejecutantes describieron la infinita veneracion del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea al Dirigente quien realizo inmortales hazanas en la historia de la patria.
					
					Y demostraron bien la realidad vivida de la patria que bajo la direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un avanza con pasos firmes logrando pleno exito en el lanzamiento de prueba de cohete balistico "Pukguksong" con el poderio de la unidad monolitica y el espiritu de la provincia de Kangwon en el proceso de la ofensiva general de este ano.
